typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	taget_table_id as string ('TT'),
	source_table_id as string ('ST'),
	etl_status as string ('C'),
	source_record_count as long (10),
	target_record_count as long (10)
}
source(output(
		TARGET_SYS_ID as string,
		TARGET_TABLE_ID as string,
		SOURCE_SYS_ID as string,
		SOURCE_TABLE_ID as string,
		SEQ_NO as integer,
		LAST_READ_TIME as timestamp,
		CUR_READ_TIME as timestamp,
		ETL_METHOD as string,
		ETL_STATUS as string,
		LOAD_MODE as string,
		LOCK_TIME as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'etl',
	folderPath: 'tableregister') ~> tableregister
source(output(
		id as short,
		name as string,
		etltime as timestamp,
		city as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'lake',
	folderPath: 'customerautomap') ~> source1
tableregister filter(TARGET_TABLE_ID == $taget_table_id) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(ETL_STATUS = $etl_status) ~> DerivedColumn1
Aggregatecount derive(TARGET_TABLE_ID = $taget_table_id,
		SOURCE_TABLE_ID = $source_table_id,
		SOURCE_RECORDS = count,
		TARGET_RECORDS = count) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Select1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
Filter2 aggregate(count = count()) ~> Aggregatecount
source1 filter(etltime >= toTimestamp('20210611', 'yyyymmdd')) ~> Filter2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		TARGET_TABLE_ID,
		SOURCE_TABLE_ID,
		SOURCE_RECORDS,
		TARGET_RECORDS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'etl',
	folderPath: 'tableregister',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TARGET_TABLE_ID'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinktableregister
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'etl',
	folderPath: 'etl_log',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		TARGET_TABLE_ID,
		SOURCE_TABLE_ID,
		SOURCE_RECORDS,
		TARGET_RECORDS
	)) ~> sinketllog
